text: This is 40 is a 2012 American comedy drama movie. It is a spin-off to the movie Knocked Up. The movie stars Paul Rudd and Leslie Mann. Megan Fox and Melissa McCarthy also appear. It was released in December 2012 and received mixed reviews from critics. == Other websites == * Category:2012 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Midlife crisis movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about marriage Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: This Is 40
